Player History
Earned first career win on 6/22/1966...
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1968...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1968 (Going to NYM: C D. Pick. Going to CHC: 2B D. Lopes)...
Injured on 5/3/1968 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1970 (Going to CHC: 3B T. Conigliaro, LF C. Yastrzemski, P T. Wilshusen. Going to NYY: C J. Ferguson, 2B D. Lopes, 1B J. Young, P E. Stephenson)...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/18/1971, off Masanori Murakami (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/21/1971, off Dave Debusschere (CHW)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 8/30/1972...

Hit for the cycle against Detroit on 6/3/1975...
